span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 凌乱的，无序的： lacking in order, neatness, and often cleanliness
【例】 unkempt hotel rooms 凌乱的酒店房间
【近】 slovenly, slipshod, sloppy, unneat, untidy, topsy-turvy, jumbled
【反】 bandbox, neat, orderly, organized, shipshape, tidy, trim, uncluttered, well-ordered 有序的，井井有条的

【记】 源自un + combed 梳理；看成 un + kept 未保持, 保养好
